evidence_span: the oxygen self-diffusion coefficients were measured. Specimens from the four experimental materials, oxidized for variable times between 1 and 100 days, were given a second oxidation treatment in water vapor enriched in O¹⁸.

source_id: STP1132-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_9th Volume_028_chunk3
evidence_span: The first series was carried out in enriched heavy water D₂O¹⁸ at 400 °C but with a low vapor pressure (1.33 kPa).

evidence_span: The second type of test used water enriched with 10% H₂O¹⁸ in an autoclave under a pressure of 9.8 MPa (i.e., close to the conventional value of 10.3 MPa).
